pips-solver/src/app/screens/builder/Step.description: Grid alignment screen with DraggableGridOverlay component. Uses react-native-gesture-handler Pan gestures (leftGesture, rightGesture, topGesture, bottomGesture) for edge dragging and Tap gesture for toggling holes. All gestures use .runOnJS(true) making them safe for haptic calls.

Region painting screen with paintGesture Pan gesture for tap/drag painting cells. Uses lastPaintedCellRef to track and avoid repainting same cell during drag. Gesture uses .runOnJS(true) making it safe for haptic calls.
